title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 932/97 of 26 May 1997 amending Regulation (EC) No 1162/95 laying down special detailed rules for the application of the system of import and export licences for cereals and rice
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 932/97 of 26 May 1997 amending Regulation (EC) No 1162/95 laying down special detailed rules for the application of the system of import and export licences for cereals and rice
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 May 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 181, 1. 7. 1992, p. 21.
(2) OJ No L 126, 24. 5. 1996, p. 37.
(3) OJ No L 329, 30. 12. 1995, p. 18.
(4) OJ No L 117, 24. 5. 1995, p. 2.
(5) OJ No L 190, 31. 7. 1996, p. 23.
(6) OJ No L 351, 14. 12. 1987, p. 1.
(7) OJ No L 116, 6. 5. 1997, p. 22.
